com.turnout.ws.controller

Class CommentsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.CommentsController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class CommentsController
extends java.lang.Object
    CommentsController class is front face for accessing and manipulating comments related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CommentsController(CommentsService commentService, StudioActivityService studioActivityService, PartyService partyService, InfoService infoService)
      An injectable constructor with dependencies as argument.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommentsController

        @Autowired
public CommentsController(CommentsService commentService,
                            StudioActivityService studioActivityService,
                            PartyService partyService,
                            InfoService infoService)
        An injectable constructor with dependencies as argument.
        Parameters:
        commentService - An Object of commentService as an injectable member.
        studioActivityService - An Object of studioActivityService as an injectable member.
        partyService - An Object of partyService as an injectable member.
        infoService - An Object of infoService as an injectable member.
        See Also:
        commentService, studioActivityService, partyService, infoService

    • Method Detail

      • addComment

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@POST
@Path(value="/addComments")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject addComment(org.json.simple.JSONObject comments)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method used to save a comments details into database.It will return a added comment details.
        Parameters:
        comments - A JSONObject contains details of comments.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject has a value of comments.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When the required post value empty or party id is not found in database.

      • getCommentswithPagination

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/comments/{cmtypeid}/{cmttype}/{pageno}/{pagesize}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray getCommentswithPagination(@PathParam(value="cmtypeid")
                                                                                 int cmtypeid,
                                                                                 @PathParam(value="cmttype")
                                                                                 java.lang.String cmttype,
                                                                                 @PathParam(value="pageno")
                                                                                 int pageno,
                                                                                 @PathParam(value="pagesize")
                                                                                 int pagesize)
        This method used to get all the comments from database.
        Parameters:
        cmtypeid - This integer value holds activity type id.
        cmttype - It has a constant value "COMMENTS".
        pageno - Current page number of comments listing.
        pagesize - Total number of records shown in current page.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results of comments.
